column5: In honour of Canada Day and the return of the reigning Grey Cup Champions taking on the tabbiesâ€¦.  ARRRRRRRRRGOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOS!!!   Have a great weekend everybody, be safe. All Canucks and our friends to the south.
Thanks froggie Robbie....a great Canada Day to you and yours as well.

Thanks, Canada Day for our family is special, even with our parents gone. Washed ashore 53 years ago, in Quebec  City worked hard and guided us well. As we do with our children and hope they do with theirs. I left last year for three weeks after 40 years and couldn't wait to come 'home'.
Go forth and have a Great Canada Day to all my friends up North.   Art
